How many people are affected by factor X deficiency ?,Factor X deficiency occurs in approximately 1 per million individuals worldwide.,GHR,factor X deficiency
What are the genetic changes related to factor X deficiency ?,"The inherited form of factor X deficiency, known as congenital factor X deficiency, is caused by mutations in the F10 gene, which provides instructions for making a protein called coagulation factor X.
